item.title: Why Privacy Matters
item.description: Have you ever stopped to think about the technology you use, or the online services you engage with on a regular basis ? Chances are you use some form of technology or internet service on a daily basis. If so, have you considered the increasing trust we are required to place in technology or companies to manage our daily interactions. Whether itâ€™s emails, holiday photos on social media, on-line shopping, internet banking or even health details; we are generating more personal data than ever before.
